name: DittoReactNativeIOS
summary: Ditto SDK for React Native iOS
description:
Ditto is an edge sync platform and this SDK helps you build incredible data
sync applications using React Native. Sync JSON-like data structures with
other devices over WiFi, Servers, Apple Wireless Direct Link (AWDL), and
even Bluetooth LE, all without worrying about the complexities of building a
multipeer application.
